id: Watch Dem Senator confront Trump over bombs mailed to Obama, CNN
paragraph: The FBI is investigating a series of pipe bombs that were sent to several prominent Democrats and CNN's New York newsroom, triggering a nationwide investigation and bipartisan condemnation. Former California Senator, Barbara Boxer tells Ari Melber that President Trump has “weaponized politics with names attached”.Oct. 24, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
